item.description:
Sorry folks but there has been a change in the time. The start time will have to be 1pm for everything instead of working at 11am and then eating at 1pm. If there is still work to be done we can do it then, otherwise we can just eat and give all the animals love until you need to leave. We're welcome to explore the farm and I can show you around of course. If you need a ride please let me know and we can organize carpooling. Again I apologize for the change and I hoep it won't interfere with anyone's ability to come!

If you can also do me a favor and give me an idea of what you'll be bringing for food or drink so I can make sure we have everything we need. Thanks for your help and patience!

For more info on the sanctuary please visit: http://www.maplefarms...


If you have any questions you can reach me at 508-459-1074 or you can email me as well.

See you all soon!!

Stephen
item.how_to_find_us: Dreads, glasses and a whole lot of veganess ;)
item.name: Worcester Vegan MeetUp & EatUp September Meetup
